file_path.description: The absolute path to the file to modify

old_string.description: The text to replace (must be non-empty and match file content exactly)

new_string.description: The text to replace it with (must be different from old_string)

replace_all.description: Replace all occurrences of old_string (default false)

expected_replacements.description: Optional safety check: exact number of matches expected in file. If greater than 1, all matches are replaced.
